content: **drops socks knitted in rib with fabel ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **women s sizes** 6½/7½ 7½/8½ 8½/9 us/can 4/5 5/6 6/7 uk 35/37 38/40 41/42 eu length of the foot 22-24-27 cm / 8 3/4 - 9½ - 10 5/8 length of the leg 18-19-20 cm / 7 - 7½ - 8 **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes color no 543 or 522 red or blue mix drops double pointed needle size 2 5 mm / us 1 or 2 or size needed to obtain the correct knitting gauge
